sentences.sentence: Medical attention seems to have actually killed President Garfield, who succumbed to a fatal infection introduced by his doctors' unsterile treatment techniques after he was shot by an assassin.
sentences.translation: 实际上，加菲尔德总统似乎是死于医疗护理，他在被刺客枪击后死于由医生的非无菌治疗技术引起的致命感染。

sentences.sentence: The assassin said he had acted alone.
sentences.translation: 暗杀者声称他是单独作案。
一个杀手在附近潜伏着。
